Title: Hero
Summary: A defense officer.Nameless.was summoned by the King of Qin regarding his success of terminating three warriors.

Title: A United Kingdom
Summary: The story of King Seretse Khama of Botswana and how his loving but controversial marriage to a British white woman.Ruth Williams.put his kingdom into political and diplomatic turmoil.

Title: Highlander
Summary: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent.a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".
